EmailTemplate.name: Let's discuss a partnership (1560178780.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Let's discuss a partnership (1560178780.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Alex,
Thank-you for choosing Grand & Toy for your Furniture needs.
During our conversations you alluded to a need for an Office/ Facility supply partner for your Candu Energy locations.
I'd like to meet you at your Candu Office in Mississauga to learn more about your business needs, and how we can help with efficiencies in this indirect spend category.
Do you have time this Thursday at 1pm to discuss what a partnership could look like?
I look forward to hearing back from you,
Best regards,
Liz RustBusiness Development Manager, Central Canada 200 Aviva Park Dr, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 365-778-8250 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
grandandtoy.com <[[http://grandandtoy.com/]]>business.grandandtoy.com <[[http://business.grandandtoy.com/]]>
